metadata.synopsis: Launched when player interacts with an item with one of the following root templates.DEC_GEN_StuffedBear_Standing_A_f8d74269-6a5c-461e-8907-2e1a7b18e1caDEC_GEN_StuffedBear_Standing_B_8177353f-5beb-4120-85ec-a4fa261795aeDEC_GEN_StuffedBear_Standing_C_d760ca77-927c-4880-98a2-991926cdd2a3 First a skill check roll is done, then the AD is launched. Global flag GLO_TemplateUseSkillCheck_StuffedBear_Success can be used to check if the roll was successful
metadata.how_to_trigger: Teleport to any of the stuffedbear_standing in the recon command and click on it.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: A tragedy. One of nature's creations, slain for vanity.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: Nature skill check did not succeedNodeContext: Looking at a huge stuffed bear

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Slain and stuffed. I would like to do the same to whoever's handiwork this is.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: Nature skill check succeeded.NodeContext: Looking at a huge stuffed bear
